title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approx. 30 seconds in my case) to complete the update.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the update is in progress.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Check/uncheck multiple checkboxes in the table.
3. Observe the time it takes to update the checked state.

Expected behavior:
- The update should be completed within a reasonable time.
- A busy cursor should be displayed to indicate the update is in progress.
